page.title: 11Arbroath.country school.
page.content: We do lots of different things in a school week.We start every day with the Lord's Prayer. Most days, several assignments are put on the blackboard with separate headings for P.5,6,and7. We are allowed to do these in any order but some are marked with a green cross which means they have to be done first.These assignments could include one hour of Maths,a spelling exercise a geography or history card;'tables'. Other lessons during the week, include handwriting,reading groups, science or nature, art and craft,sewing or knitting. On Thursdays we do P.E. in the village hall but the P.E. teacher Mrs.Beattie only comes every second week . On Tuesday afternoons we have Art with Mrs Thomlinson from 2.30 p.m till 3.30. On Friday we have music with Mrs.Neal
